author: Special Correspondent
text:
“Antisocials threaten AIADMK cadres”

Members of the All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam have submitted a complaint to Collector K. Veera Raghava Rao here that some antisocial elements, in support of the Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam, were disrupting the peaceful election-related works being carried out by the party cadres.

A team of advocates lodged the complaint in this connection on Friday. In his complaint, party lawyers’ wing vice-president M. Pandiarajan said that the antisocial elements were threatening the AIADMK cadres involved in verification of voters’ list. He said that the election-related works were being carried out by the AIADMK functionaries with due permission from the city police.

He wanted the Collector to ensure that history-sheeters supporting the DMK were detained under preventive custody.
title: “Antisocial elements threatening AIADMK cadres”
